root.name: Tap Tap Revenge: NIN Edition
root.description: The first special edition of the popular iPhone/iPod Touch game Tap Tap: Revenge. This version has a licensed soundtrack by the Band Nine Inch Nails. The game introduces a new difficulty setting, even harder than the previously existing "Expert" level.Â The track list is as follows:1,000,000 Discipline 3 Ghosts I Echoplex 18 Ghosts II 19 Ghosts III Head Down 21 Ghosts III 26 Ghosts III Demon Seed 31 Ghosts IV Letting You 9 Ghosts I
